data.title: Anagrams
data.solution:
<?php
fscanf(STDIN, "%d", $N);
for ($i = 0; $i < $N; $i++)
{
    $S[] = stream_get_line(STDIN, 1024 + 1, "\n");
}


$baseSentence = $S[0];
$baseSentenceArray = str_split(str_replace(' ', '', strtolower($baseSentence)));
sort($baseSentenceArray);

$count = 0;
for ($i=1;$i<$N; ++$i) {
    $currentSentenceArray = str_split(str_replace(' ', '', strtolower($S[$i])));
    sort($currentSentenceArray);

    if (md5(serialize($baseSentenceArray)) === md5(serialize($currentSentenceArray))) {
        ++$count;
    }
}

if ($count >= 1) {
    ++$count;
}

echo("$count\n");
?>
data.statement:
The goal is to indicate the quantity of anagrams present in the series of words.
Case and spaces should be ignored.

testCases.title: Test 2
testCases.testIn:
8
asper
spear
pares
prase
apres
reaps
reals
pears

data.stubGenerator:
read N:int
loop N read S:string(100)
write answer
data.inputDescription:
<<Line 1:>> An integer [[N]] for the number of sentences.
<<next [[N]] lines:>> Sentences [[S]].
data.outputDescription: <<Line 1 :>> An integer. {{0}} if nothing goes together.

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

The goal is to indicate the quantity of anagrams present in the series of words.
Case and spaces should be ignored.
Input
Line 1: An integer N for the number of sentences.
next N lines: Sentences S.
Output
Line 1 : An integer. 0 if nothing goes together.
Constraints
2 ≤ N ≤ 10
Example
Input
2
arc
car
Output
2
